org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.api.helpers

Class DefaultApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.cep.core.api.helpers.DefaultApplication

  • public abstract class DefaultApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for CEP applications. By extending it, a CEPEngine and an EventStream is available for use. The user must implement the DefaultApplication#configureRules() method by specifying the rules to be instantiated for the engine.
